English: to turn off, turns off, has turned off
to hand in, hands in, has handed in
to put on/get dressed, puts on, has put on
to get up, gets up, has gotten up
to fail/be canceled, fails, has failed
to go out, goes out, has gone out
to fall asleep, falls asleep, has fallen asleep
to watch TV, watches TV, has watched TV
to be called, is called, has been called
to know (be acquainted with), knows, has known
to be sorry, is sorry, has been sorry
to lie/be located, lies, has lain
to depart/set off, departs, has departed
to bring along, brings along, has brought along
to come along, comes along, has come along
to take along, takes along, has taken along
to check/look up, checks, has checked
to come in, comes in, has come in
to take place, takes place, has taken place
to drive away, drives away, has driven away
to come back, comes back, has come back
